pages.text: You can run horizontally sticking to wall. This should help you to jump to a distance platform.$(br2)Although Sometimes misunderstood, the technique of $(l:actions/wall_run)Wall Run$() is vertical one, not horizontal.

pages.title: How to Use
pages.text: $(bold)1.$() Do $(l:parcool:actions/fast_run)Fast Run$() in air along the wall$(br)$(bold)2.$() Continue to press Wall-Run Key($(k:parcool.HorizontalWallRun))
